title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Create a detailed document outlining the requirements for the InclusivityAnalyzer tool. This should include target users, use cases, desired features, data sources (internal and external), integration points (APIs, services), security and privacy considerations, performance and scalability requirements, and a roadmap for implementing these requirements in phases. Consider accessibility, usability, and cultural sensitivity in the design of this tool.

title: Design System Architecture (Revised)
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, and consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects. Also, ensure the design is inclusive and follows best practices for diversity and accessibility.
dependencies: Conduct Market Research and Competitor Analysis

title: Define Data Model and Storage - InclusivityAnalyzer
description: Design the data model and storage solution for company communications, decisions, analysis results, and metadata related to inclusivity. This includes structuring the data for efficient querying and analysis.

title: Develop Analysis Algorithms
description: Implement algorithms and machine learning models to analyze company communications and decisions for inclusivity and diversity.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the InclusivityAnalyzer tool, including data input, analysis configuration, and result visualization.

title: Implement Data Integration
description: Develop mechanisms to integrate company communications and decisions from various sources into the InclusivityAnalyzer tool.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated builds, testing, and deployment.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop comprehensive security measures and access controls to ensure data privacy, protect sensitive company information, and adhere to GDPR and other relevant regulations. This includes authentication, authorization, encryption, and secure data storage.

title: Create Test Suite
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite to validate the functionality and performance of the InclusivityAnalyzer tool.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for the InclusivityAnalyzer tool.
